summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Lots 5 and 6, Block 1, Churchills Suburban Villa One Acre Tracts; Lot 1, Block 6, Plat of Lake Forest Park 4th Addition Division A; Lot 14, Block 2, First Addition to Adams Home Tracts; Parcel B of City of Seattle Short Plat No. 8903040, as recorded under Recording No. 8912271016, records of King County, Washington; Lot 1, Block 28, Lake Forest Park 3rd Addition; Parcel B, of City of Seattle Short Plat No. 9003436, as recorded under Recording No. 9108050157, records of King County, Washington; Lots 3 and 4, Block 4, Richmond Tracts Division No. 3; Lot 20, Block 31, Lake Forest Park 3rd Addition; Parcel B of City of Seattle Short Plat No. 9200426, as recorded under Recording No. 9207301588; Lot 38, Block 28, Lake Forest Park 3rd Addition; and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
